pages.text: The Thrasher is a dangerous hostile creature that can be found in the Frozen Oceans.$(br2)They detect their preys using echolocation. When they detect one prey, they quick attack it.$(br2)On death they may drop Thrasher Tooths that can be use to craft new blocks like Tooth Block, Tooth Tiles, Tooth Bricks, Tooth Trapdoor, Tooth Doors and a Tooth Lantern.
You can use it to craft Bone Meal and even a Trident too.
It exists a even dangerous of this creature known as Great Thrasher, it's hard to find.
